title: Connection Error
body:
So, I'm pretty sure I have internet connection. I can to websites on chrome right now, and I can even talk to the friends using the LoL chat. HOWEVER, I get a message when I try to queue for my bot game. It keeps on saying, HTTP error, please check your connection and retry...or something like that. That is strange because 1) I have internet (how else did I create this) and 2) I am literally talking to people using the LoL chat thing. So what is happening? I tried to reconnect several times (about like 10). So...yeah. Am I going to get penalized for missing a bot game?

STATUS UPDATE: SO!!!! The bot game finished, and I relog, and it was stated as a leave. So i decided to create a custom game with me and 1 bot opponent. Guess what? CONNECTION ERROR! Is it just me? Or are other people having the same error?

replies.body:
This error message may be a little misleading and not actually a connection problem.  It looks to me like your game and its files can't be accessed so nothing can load or render the game.  Try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access to game files are being allowed.  Try it out after in a custom game and let me know if that helps.

If the issue persists then we can look into connection issues, but I want to give you the heads up on that because even if your net is fine you can still have problems connecting to specific servers.

Update: Restarted cpu and game for the 3rd time, and I created a custom game, and it won't connect. Please, I really  want to know if there is anything I can do.  Not only that but, I tried to click SUPPORT tab for the LoL website but it keeps on saying, "cannot connect...page taking too long to respond."

MORE EDITS: So I've been able to spectate games, yet still unable to play a game myself...
